name: Flawless Desert Perpetual Raid
description: Looking for a cool shader and a way to increase the raid exotic drop chance? Our Destiny 2 Desert Perpetual Flawless raid boost offers you just that, on top with some powerful weapons and gear for your character. With our Flawless Desert Perpetual carry service, you will get: The entire raid completed without any deaths A higher chance to get the raid exotic weapon The Death-Defiant Triumph The Mediant Flourish Shader Some raid weapons & armor Experience for your Season Pass and Artifact
